Instantly.AddIRCMessage: @#PLAYERNAME#, there's something I need to let you know about in regards to this mission.
According to preliminary scans, two of the three target computers have active firewalls.
Firewalls are typically set up with a password, so they can be taken down or bypassed for maintenance.
What you need to do is run the Analyze command on your terminal while you're connected, and keep running it until the password shows up.
Once you have the password, run the 'Solve' command and enter the password. If you're correct, you'll bypass the firewall and can start cracking in.
TL;DR- Use the Analyze, @#PLAYERNAME#, only then will you be able to solve the mystery, and destroy your enemies. #trudat
